DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research determine specific type elasticated athletic tape ( Kinesio Tex Tape ) increase muscle activation among professional level dancer . Investigators determine change muscle activation elasticated tape differ change experience tape and/or sham tape , coincides subjective sense muscle activation .
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness Kinesio® Tex Tape Gluteus Medius Activation Dancers
DOC.criteria: Uninjured professional level dancer Nonprofessional level dance nondancer ; obesity ( body mass index great 30 kg/m² ) A history major back , abdominal , low extremity surgery A history muscle disease ; history serious cardiovascular disease ( e.g. , cardiac insufficiency , arrhythmia , severe hypertension , vascular insufficiency ) A history serious respiratory disease ; major fracture low extremity ; low extremity trunk injury within last year ; history surgery within last year , history stroke , acute , chronic infection ; serious metabolic diseases Glaucoma Structural disease severe congenital deformity spine high degree Inguinal , femoral , umbilical hernia ; disease relate body equilibrium .
